19 Nov 2007

Hi

&aetilde;, &aunderbar;, &be;, &caretbelow;, &cnt;, &coll;, &dated;, &desuet;, &edh;, &esbacgr;, &evulg;, &fam;,\n&fata;, &fatatilde;, &fm;, &fvulg;, &glots;, &hw;, &hwdash;, &mgrave;, &msyllab;, &ncnt;, &vieil;, &vvf;, &wz;,\n&ybreve;, &zh;
